핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 두 집단·사람이 서로 주고받는 관계를 표현함.
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Their cooperation was reciprocal. 2) Respect should be reciprocal.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: reciprocal 의미? → 상호적; Q2: 유사어? → mutual; Q3: 반의어? → one-sided

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): implement a policy, implement a plan
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The company implemented new rules. 2) The program was successfully implemented.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: implement 뜻? → 실행하다; Q2: 명사형? → implementation; Q3: collocation? → implement a policy

반의어: carry out an experiment, carry out a task
콜로케이션(뜻 포함): 1) They carried out the research. 2) The plan was carried out smoothly.
OX 체크용 문항(기본값 X): Q1: carry out 의미? → 수행하다; Q2: 유사 표현? → implement; Q3: collocation? → carry out an experiment

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) She takes after her mother. 2) He really takes after his grandfather.
학습 팁: 유사 표현 look like과 구별: take after=성격/습관 포함.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: take after 의미? → 닮다; Q2: 주 사용 대상? → 가족; Q3: 유사 표현? → resemble

핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 기반이 되거나 핵심적 역할을 하는 상태.
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Freedom is a fundamental right. 2) Understanding is fundamental to learning.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: fundamental 의미? → 근본적; Q2: 전치사? fundamental ___ → to; Q3: 반의어? → superficial

반의어: major drawback, drawback to the plan
콜로케이션(뜻 포함): 1) The only drawback is the cost. 2) There are several drawbacks to the system.
OX 체크용 문항(기본값 X): Q1: drawback 의미? → 단점; Q2: 전치사? drawback ___ → of/to; Q3: 반의어? → advantage

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Prices remained constant. 2) She was in constant pain.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: constant 뜻? → 지속적; Q2: 반의어? → variable; Q3: 명사형? → constant(상수)

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Sales increased steadily. 2) She steadily improved her skills.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: steadily 의미? → 꾸준히; Q2: 형용사형? → steady; Q3: 반의어? → sporadically

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Early humans used primitive tools. 2) The system is primitive by today’s standards.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: primitive 뜻? → 원시적; Q2: 반의어? → modern; Q3: collocation? → primitive tools

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): dominate the market, dominate a game
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The team dominated the match. 2) One company dominates the industry.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: dominate 뜻? → 지배하다; Q2: 명사형? → dominance; Q3: collocation? → dominate the market
